requests.name: Get All Items
Insert item
requests.docs:
# Insert item 

This will insert an item to a specific category of a restaurant

**URL** : `api/menu/items/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Data Passed** : Through JSON Post i.e `req.body`

**Auth required** : NO

## Success Response

**Code** : `200 OK`

```json
{
  "message": "Inserted new item",
  "data": {
    "_id": "6280f6c3f018d52fa579cda1",
    "restaurantName": "PizzaHut",
    "categoryName": "Pizza",
    "items": [
      {
        "itemName": "Chicken Tikka",
        "itemPrice": 1300,
        "itemDescription": "13 Inch Pizza",
        "_id": "62811d1aa04fc26b7b860ef4"
      }
    ],
    "__v": 0
  }
}
```

## Error Response

**Code** : `400 Bad Request`

```json
{
  "error": "Could not find restaurant or some error occured"
}```

requests.name: Delete item
requests.docs:
# Delete an item 

This will delete a specific item from a specific category using itemName

**URL** : `api/menu/items/`

**Method** : `DELETE`

**Data Passed** : Through JSON Post i.e `req.body`

**Auth required** : NO

## Success Response

**Code** : `200 OK`

Updated data is returned 

```json
{
  "data": {
    "_id": "62811326f94531976abcf28b",
    "restaurantName": "PizzaHut",
    "categoryName": "Drinks",
    "items": [
      {
        "itemName": "Pepsi",
        "itemPrice": 70,
        "itemDescription": "500ml pepsi",
        "_id": "6281295630a97e19b543319f"
      }
    ],
    "__v": 0
  }
}
```

## Error Response

**Code** : `400 Bad Request`

```json
{
  "error": "Could not find restaurant or category"
}
```

requests.name: Register Customer
requests.docs:
# Create new user

This will create a new customer in the cutomers collections.

**URL** : `/api/auth/register/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Data Passed** : Through JSON i.e `req.body`

**Auth required** : NO

## Success Response

**Code** : `200 OK`

```json
{
  "msg": "Successfully registered user",
  "data": {
    "username": "AsaadNAa",
    "email": "asaad.abbaasi@gmail.com",
    "password": "123456",
    "userType": "customer",
    "_id": "627fd4ddd9ca9b2450bbd529",
    "__v": 0
  }
}

```

## Error Response

**Code** : `400 Bad Request`

```json
{
  "msg": "Successfully registered user",
  "data": {
    "username": "AsaadNAa",
    "email": "asaad.abbaasi@gmail.com",
    "password": "123456",
    "userType": "customer",
    "_id": "627fd4ddd9ca9b2450bbd529",
    "__v": 0
  }
}
````

requests.name: Login Customer
requests.docs:
# Login Customer
This will check credentials of a customer and create a new session

**URL** : `api/auth/login/customer/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Data Passed** : Through JSON i.e `req.body`

**Auth required** : NO

## Success Response

**Code** : `200 OK`

```json
{
  "message": "Successfully logged in and session created",
  "data": {
    "username": "AsaadNA",
    "userType": "customer"
  }
}

```

## Error Response

**Code** : `400 Bad Request`

```json
{
  "error": "Customer already registered with the email asaad.abbasi@gmail.com"
}

requests.name: Get Session
requests.docs:
# Get Session
This will return the current user in session (Customer or Restaurant)

**URL** : `api/auth/login/`

**Method** : `GET`

**Auth required** : NO

## Success Response

**Code** : `200 OK`

```json
{
  "message": "Customer still in session",
  "data": {
    "username": "AsaadNA",
    "userType": "customer"
  }
}
```

## Error Response

**Code** : `400 Bad Request`

```json
{
  "error": "User is not in session"
}
```

requests.name: Logout
requests.docs:
# Get Session
This will logout the user and destroy the current session

**URL** : `api/auth/logout/`

**Method** : `GET`

**Auth required** : NO

## Success Response

**Code** : `200 OK`

```json
{
  "message": "User logged out"
}
```

## Error Response

**Code** : `400 Bad Request`

```json
{
  "error": "User is not in session"
}
```

requests.name: Register Restaurant
requests.docs:
# Register Restaurant

This will create a new restaurant in the restaurant collection.

**URL** : /api/auth/register/restaurant/

**Method** : `POST`

**Data Passed** : Through JSON i.e `req.body`

**Auth required** : NO

## Success Response

**Code** : `200 OK`

```json
{
  "message": "Successfully registered the restaurant",
  "data": {
    "restaurantName": "HotNSpicy",
    "email": "hotnspicy@gmail.com",
    "password": "123456",
    "operatingArea": "Malir Cantonment",
    "_id": "628124e6796bff9f0a77f07d",
    "__v": 0
  }
}

```

## Error Response

**Code** : `400 Bad Request`

```json
{
  "error": "Restaurant already registered with the email hotnspicy@gmail.com"
}
````

requests.name: Login Restaurant
requests.docs:
# Login Restaurant

This will check credentials using email and create a new session for restaurant

**URL** : /api/auth/login/restaurant/

**Method** : `POST`

**Data Passed** : Through JSON i.e `req.body`

**Auth required** : NO

## Success Response

**Code** : `200 OK`

```json
{
  "message": "Successfully logged in and session created",
  "data": {
    "email": "pizzahut@gmail.com",
    "userType": "restaurant"
  }
}

```

## Error Response

**Code** : `400 Bad Request`

```json
{
  "error": "Invalid email"
}
````

```json
{
  "error": "Restaurant already registered with the same name HotNSpicy"
}
```

requests.name: Create Category
requests.docs:
# Create Category 

This will create a new category for a specific restaurant as well as check whether
or not duplicate category is inserted or not 

**URL** : `/api/menu/category/:restaurantName/:categoryName`

**Method** : `POST`

**Data Passed** : Through route param i.e `req.params`

**Auth required** : NO

## Success Response

**Code** : `200 OK`

```json
{
  "message": "Successfully added Desert category",
  "data": {
    "restaurantName": "PizzaHut",
    "categoryName": "Desert",
    "_id": "628126e1796bff9f0a77f091",
    "items": [],
    "__v": 0
  }
}

```

## Error Response

**Code** : `400  Bad Request`

```json
{
  "error": "Desert category already exists for this restaurant"
}
````

requests.name: Delete Category
requests.docs:
# Delete Category 

This will delete a specific category for a specific restaurant 

**URL** : `/api/menu/category/:restaurantName/:categoryName`

**Method** : `DELETE`

**Data Passed** : Through route param i.e `req.params`

**Auth required** : NO

## Success Response

**Code** : `200 OK`

```json
{
  "message": "Successfully delete Desert category"
}

```

## Error Response

**Code** : `400  Bad Request`

```json
{
  "error": "Desert category already exists for this restaurant"
}
````

requests.name: Update Category
requests.docs:
# Update Category 

This will delete a specific category for a specific restaurant 

**URL** : `/api/menu/category/:restaurantName/:categoryName/:updatedCategoryName`

**Method** : `PUT`

**Data Passed** : Through route param i.e `req.params`

**Auth required** : NO

## Success Response

**Code** : `200 OK`

```json
{
  "message": "Successfully updated Drinks category",
  "data": {
    "_id": "62811326f94531976abcf28b",
    "restaurantName": "PizzaHut",
    "categoryName": "Pizza",
    "items": [
      {
        "itemName": "Pepsi",
        "itemPrice": 70,
        "itemDescription": "500ml pepsi",
        "_id": "6281295630a97e19b543319f"
      },
      {
        "itemName": "Coke",
        "itemPrice": 70,
        "itemDescription": "500ml coke",
        "_id": "628129ee30a97e19b54331a4"
      }
    ],
    "__v": 0
  }
}

```

## Error Response

**Code** : `400  Bad Request`

```json
{
  "error": "Desert category already exists for this restaurant"
}
````
